name: AI-Powered-Resume-Analyzer
desc: Smartly match your resume to job descriptions using AI and NLP! Upload your resume, let the backend parse and analyze it, and get instant feedback on your job fit.

name: Medicine Investigation System
desc: Built a Multi-Platform System using blockchain for secure data management and cross-platform tools for web and mobile access.

name: Retail Sales Forecasting
desc: Built ML/DL models (XGBoost, LSTM) to forecast Walmart sales, aiding inventory planning through EDA, tuning, and deployment-ready insights.

name: Chatbot
desc: Flutter-based chatbot app with a Flask backend, utilizing the DeepSeek API for real-time AI-driven responses and running locally with Ollama.

name: Smart Coin Counter
desc: Automated coin sorting system with ESP32, sensors, and Firebase integration. Flutter app for real-time monitoring and management of coin counts

name: Talking Book
desc: Flutter app converting PDFs to audio using OCR, NLP, and Text-to-Speech for enhanced accessibility, with Firebase integration for user data management

name: Hostel Management System
desc: Developed a responsive Hostel Management System web app using .NET, ASP.NET, C#, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and MS SQL Server for efficient management and secure data handling.

name: Ecommerce Sales Analysis
desc: Analyzed sales data to uncover trends and insights on pricing and performance using Python, focusing on visualization and statistical analysis.

name: Real CountDown
desc: Flutter app with Firebase for selling properties, allowing to upload images, descriptions, receive bids, with integrated chat and Google Maps for location services.

name: Idea Pro
desc: An app allowing entrepreneurs to upload their ideas briefly, where investors can browse, contact, and negotiate via in-app chat, using Flutter and Firebase.
